## EpicModeExtensionOptions interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface EpicModeExtensionOptions extends BaseExtensionOptions 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [colors](./extension-epic-mode.epicmodeextensionoptions.colors.md) | <code>string[]</code> | The colors for the epic effect |
|  [particleEffect](./extension-epic-mode.epicmodeextensionoptions.particleeffect.md) | <code>ParticleEffect</code> | The particle effect to use |
|  [particleRange](./extension-epic-mode.epicmodeextensionoptions.particlerange.md) | <code>ParticleRange</code> | Range for the particles |
|  [shake](./extension-epic-mode.epicmodeextensionoptions.shake.md) | <code>boolean</code> | Whether the editor should shake |
|  [shakeTime](./extension-epic-mode.epicmodeextensionoptions.shaketime.md) | <code>number</code> | How long the shaking should last for |
